portal.createInitiated:
Portal location stored. Go to the teleport target location and run the command again to create the portal.
Otherwise, do /quake portal cancel

armorSpawner.wrongType: <red>Wrong armor type, use either of: shard, light, heavy</red>

chat.switchNoMatch: <red>Unable to switch to <chatroom> chat, you are not in a match</red>

chatroom.invalid: <red>This is a bug! This chatroom is invalid!</red>

ctfFlag.wrongTeam: <red>Wrong team, use either of: red, blue</red>

error.duplicateMap: <red>There is already a map with that name</red>
error.generic: <red>An error has occurred, please contact the server administrators.</red>

healthSpawner.wrongType: <red>Wrong health type, use either of: small, medium, large, mega</red>

match.already: <red>You are in a match, please leave if you wish to join another</red>
match.mapOccupied: <red>There is already a match in progress on <map_name>. Please wait for the match to finish.</red>

matchmaking.alreadySearching: <red>You are already searching for a match!</red>
matchmaking.canceledMatchNoAccept: <red>Your game was canceled because you did not accept.</red>
matchmaking.generic: <red>We are sorry, something has gone terribly wrong on the matchmaking side. Please contact the server admins.</red>
matchmaking.mapUnfit:
<red>Map <map_name> is unfit for <mode>
Try choosing a different map pool or mode.</red>
matchmaking.noCancel: <red>You can't cancel after accepting the match!</red>
matchmaking.noPendingMatch: <red>You have no pending match to accept!</red>
matchmaking.onlyOneMap: <red>Queuing for more than one map is currently unsupported</red>

search.inMatch: <red>Please leave the match before starting a search</red>
search.ohShitItsFucked: <red>Your match search has been canceled to prevent further errors.</red>

party.alreadyThere: <red>This player is already in your party</red>

command.leaderOnly: <red>Only party leader has access to this command</red>

invite.didntAccept: <player_name> did not accept your party invite

matchmaking.leaderOnly: <red>Only party leader has access to matchmaking</red>

party.noInvite: <red>You have no pending party invite to accept!</red>
party.single: <red>You are the only one in this party</red>
party.tooBig:
<red>Your party has <party_size> players instead of the maximum <max_players> allowed for the map <map_name>
Please remove one or more players from your party.</red>

weapon.unknown: This weapon is unknown or not yet implemented

error.worldEdit: <red>WorldEdit is either not installed or loaded</red>

debug.disclaimer: This match is for testing purposes only!

accept.title: Your game is ready!
accept.subtitle: You have <seconds> seconds to accept
accept.chat:
Your match has been found:
Type "/quake matchmaking accept" to accept the match.

start.message:
Searching for matches... 
Use "/quake matchmaking cancel" to stop searching

disabled.partySingle: Disabled - you are the only one in this party

menu.kickPlayer: Double left click to kick the player

suicide.bfg: <victim_name> should have used a smaller gun
suicide.lava: <victim_name> does a back flip into the lava

party.invitedBy:
<inviter_name> has invited you to their party. Type "/quake party accept" to accept the invite.
This invite is valid for 30 seconds, if you wish to deny, do not accept.

search.leaderDidntAccept: Game canceled, party leader did not accept

party.title: Party

matchmaking.continueSearch: <yellow>One or more of the players did not accept the match. Search continues.</yellow>

party.leavingWhileLeader: <yellow>You are leaving your own party. The party will have someone else selected as the leader.</yellow>
